mapper.select: SELECT c.licenseNum,p.beginTime,p.endTime,p.totalTime,f.total,f.paid,f.fareId FROM fare f JOIN parkingtime p ON p.timeId = f.timeId JOIN car c ON c.carId = p.carId WHERE c.driverId = #{driverId}
mapper.update: update fare set paid = 1 where fareId = #{fareId}
mapper.insert: insert into ordertab(timeId, beginTime, endTime, totalTime, money) values (#{timeId},#{beginTime},#{endTime},#{totalTime},#{money});
